avalancheActivity.highlights: New snow in mountains can be unstable. Older snow is considered stable.

snowpackStructure.highlights: New snow on Saturday. New snow forecasted on Sunday and Monday. Older snow is expected to be stable but. The new snow could get unstable where it accumulates especially high in mountains were there is no thaw. Only small avalanches are expected.

travelAdvisory.comment: The snowpack has become isothermal many places and stable in the mild weather in recent days. Small slabs could form in N-Iceland over the weekend.
travelAdvisory.highlights: The snowpack has become isothermal many places and stable in the mild weather in recent days. Small slabs could form in N-Iceland over the weekend.

weatherForecast.highlights: Snjókoma til fjalla aðfaranótt sunnudags, fyrst í SV-átt og síðan SA-átt. Rigning á láglendi. Hlýnar á sunnudagsmorgun og verður frostlaust upp í 500-800 m. Kólnar og snjóar í A- og síðan SV-átt á mánudag.

avalancheActivity.comment: Wet slab in Naustahvilft 19th of March.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Little precipitation in the next days. Older snow is considered stable.

snowpackStructure.highlights: In recent days, the snow has settled and strengthened in the mild weather. Older snow is expected to be stable but some new snow could come over the next days but rain at lowlands. The new snow could get unstable where it accumulates but only small avalanches are expected

travelAdvisory.comment: The snowpack has become isothermal many places and stable in the mild weather in recent days. Small slabs could form in N-Iceland over the weekend.
travelAdvisory.highlights: The snowpack has become isothermal many places and stable in the mild weather in recent days. Small slabs could form in N-Iceland over the weekend.

weatherForecast.highlights: Hæglætis veður og hiti við frostmark. Möguleiki á lítilsháttar éljum á stöku stað. SV-átt og él á sunnudag. NA-átt á mánudag, úrkomulítið.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Snow has settled in recent days, but older wind slabs might still remain at higher elevations.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Diurnal fluctuations are affecting the snowpack these days. Some softer snow or old wind slabs can be found in gullies and depressions at higher elevations. It will snow a bit over the weekend and small slabs could form, especially on easterly aspects. Loose snow or small wet avalanches may occur where the sun reaches and due to warming temperatures.

travelAdvisory.comment: The snowpack has become isothermal many places and stable in the mild weather in recent days. Small slabs could form in N-Iceland over the weekend.
travelAdvisory.highlights: The snowpack has become isothermal many places and stable in the mild weather in recent days. Small slabs could form in N-Iceland over the weekend.

weatherForecast.highlights: Breytilegar áttir og snjókoma með köflum um helgina. Gæti skafið í austlægar hlíðar á sunnudag. Kólnar dálítið í veðri.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Little or no snow at low elevations and hard packed snow in the mountains. Softer snow is present in ravines and depressions.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Little or no snow is at low elevations and hard packed snow is in the mountains. Snow is considered mostly stable. A little snow is forecasted at high elevations over the weekend.

travelAdvisory.comment: The snowpack has become isothermal many places and stable in the mild weather in recent days. Small slabs could form in N-Iceland over the weekend.
travelAdvisory.highlights: The snowpack has become isothermal many places and stable in the mild weather in recent days. Small slabs could form in N-Iceland over the weekend.

weatherForecast.highlights: Breytilegar áttir næstu daga og úrkoma með köflum; snjókoma til fjalla en rigning eða slydda á láglendi. Kólnar dálítið um helgina.
